content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT TOP 100
    jsonContent
    , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.userId') AS userId
/* --> place the keys that you see in JSON documents in the WITH clause:
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key1') AS header1
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key2') AS header2
*/
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://asadatalakedp203xb.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/online-user-profiles-01/UserIdBucket=004/0003001.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON (jsonContent)
    WITH (
        cartId varchar(MAX),
    ) AS reviews
